Export.Routine:
INWEINVD #include COMSYS #include INConst #include WWWConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Wrapper for older access through routine name ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;############################################################################### ; ; THE REPORTING FUNCTION IN THIS ROUTINE HAS BEEN SUPERSEDED BY THE ROUTINE ; INStocktakeReport1 WHICH IS BASED ON STOCK BUNDLES. ; ;############################################################################### ; 11-May-2011 shobby SR17559: Changes to form/class do Report() quit GoTo() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Go to the ... ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 04-Aug-2009 PPP SR16816: Need to pass the Paramaters to the GoToFrom function ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Specific tag to meet coding standards. ; 30-Sep-2008 GRF SR15810: Call INStocktakePost rather than INWEINRUECK. ; 03-Jan-2008 shobby SRBR014827: Changing the 'Reason Code' field will ; refresh the form disabling/enabling the 'Post' button. ; 08-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: New button 'M' that goes to a Managers View ; 28-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014557: If VORG(15) has disappeared due to change in ; stocktaking number then determine a valid value. ; 19-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Correct VORG from the header of the stocktake. ; 29-May-2006 JW SR14680: Added P-Post ; 03-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YEXITFORM,strPARA set VORG(1) = $$GetYKEY^WWWFORMD() ;Not necessary???? Seems is necessary. do UpdateVORG(.VORG) merge ^CacheTempStocktakePara(YUSER) = VORG set VORG(15) = $$FindVORG15(VORG(1),$get(VORG(15))) ;SRBR014557 set strPARA = YPARA kill YPARA ; vvvvv SR15810 ; FIXME : see UpdateVORG - Values would appear to be in INWEINVP so ; shouldn't need to be passed to reports as can be extracted from ; the header record. if strPARA="" { do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVD",VORG(1),1,"",$$$NO,"","") } else { do $case(strPARA, "C":Report^INStocktakeReport1(), "E":GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVEHeader",VORG(1)), "M":GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVEHeader",VORG(1),,strPARA), //SR16816 "D":Report^INStocktakeReport2(), "T":Report^INStocktakeReport3(), "P":Post^INStocktakePost($get(VORG(1)),$get(VORG(2)),$get(VORG(3)),$get(VORG(7)),$get(VORG(8)),$get(VORG(13))) ) } ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; INWEINVD ; VORG(1) P1 Stocktake No ; VORG(2) M2 Location ; VORG(3) M3 Item Group ; VORG(7) M7 From Storage ; VORG(8) M8 To Storage ; VORG(13) M13 Reason Code ; VORG(15) M15 Count ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /* if strPARA="" { do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVD",VORG(1),1,"",$$$NO,"","") } else { do $case(strPARA, "C":^INWEINVD, "E":GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVEHeader",VORG(1)), "M":GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVEHeader",VORG(1)), "D":^INWEINVDIF, "T":^INWEINVDS, "P":^INWEINRUECK) } */ ; ^^^^^ SR15810 set YPARA="" quit FindVORG15(pidStocktake,pVORG15="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: clarify variable ; 27-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014730: If the value of VORG(15) has disappeared ; due to screen redraw. Make a guess of a valid value. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objINWEINVP,intGuess set objINWEINVP = $get(^INWEINVP(YM,pidStocktake,1)) if (pVORG15>$$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(objINWEINVP)) || (pVORG15="") { set intGuess = 1 ;$$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(objINWEINVP) } else { set intGuess = pVORG15 } quit intGuess OnBeforeFormConstruction() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Changes the view of a form to Standard or Manual form depending ; on the context of the display ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 07-Jan-2008 shobby SRBR014866: Clear YPARA so that refreshing the 'Reason ; Code' field does not reuse the value previously set ; when pressing the M or E buttons etc. ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if YFORM="INWEINVD" { if YPARA="C" { set $piece(YVOR,Y,2) = 4 ;Manual Form } else { set $piece(YVOR,Y,2) = 1 ;Standard form } } set YPARA = "" quit UpdateVORG(&VORG) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Setup VORG to use the header of the stocktake as a data source ; ; Params: ; VORG: The entries of how the stocktake should be handled ; ; ByRefs: ; VORG ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 08-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Added VORG(9) ; 19-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idStocktake,objStocktake,objINWEINVDManual set idStocktake = VORG(1) set objStocktake = $get(^INWEINVP(YM,idStocktake,1)) set VORG(2) = $$$INWEINVPSiteLocation(objStocktake) set VORG(3) = $$$INWEINVPItemGroup(objStocktake) set VORG(7) = $$$INWEINVPFromStockLocation(objStocktake) set VORG(8) = $$$INWEINVPToStockLocation(objStocktake) set objINWEINVDManual = $$GetFormData^COMUtilForm("INWEINVD","M") set VORG(9) = $piece(objINWEINVDManual,Y,9) ; bln - Print Stock On Hand Qty quit OnBlur(pintField="", pYFELD="", pYKEY="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Called BY : ; form INWEINVD : F15 (Count) - OnBlur ; ; Params: ; pintField ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Return value "1" not required - removed ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014730: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- quit:$$$NoKey(pYKEY) if (pintField'="") && (YUCI'="") && (YUSER'="") { set ^CacheTempStockTake(YUCI,YUSER,"M",pintField) = $get(YINHALT) } if ( (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesHEVA($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) || (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesSESPE($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) || (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesSESDF($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1))))) { set fieldValue = $piece($$GetFormData^COMUtilForm("INWEINVD","M"),Y,15) set contagem = $piece($get(^INWEINVP(YM,pYKEY,1)),Y,26) quit:(contagem="") if (fieldValue = "") { $$$Alert("Favor especificar a contagem que deseja visualizar.") set ^VARTempContagem(YM,pYKEY,$$$NO) = $$$OK do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INWEINVD",pYKEY) } elseif (+fieldValue '= 0){ kill ^VARTempContagem(YM,pYKEY,$$$NO) } } quit OnAfterPrimaryKey(YKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Code to run after the primary key ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SRStocktake: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- merge VORG = ^CacheTempStocktakePara(YUSER) do BuildCOMTempList(YKEY) quit BuildCOMTempList(pidINWEINVP="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Builds the list of counts that can be selected. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Return value "1" not required - removed ; 26-Nov-2007 shobby SR:Adhoc : Removed PopulateDataField (Can give a ; javascript error) Anyway default value is set in the ; 'Default Value' event of the field. ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SR:Stocktake Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objData,idINWEINVP,objINWEINVP,intLoop kill ^COMTempList(YM,YUSER,"StockTakeCount") if $get(pidINWEINVP)'="" { set objINWEINVP=$get(^INWEINVP(YM,pidINWEINVP,1)) for intLoop=1:1:$$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(objINWEINVP) { set ^COMTempList(YM,YUSER,"StockTakeCount",intLoop,1) = "" } } quit OnAfterDataFields(pYKEY,&pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Forces focus to the drop down 'Count' list. ; There seems to be some curious logic in WWWBODY that is supposed to do something ; like this, but only on certain conditions. Rather than trying to debug that 5 minutes ; before a build this routine was used to force the issue. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Return value "1" not required - removed ; 15-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014780: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $$$StartScript() write YCR," var objcontrol=document.getElementById('Y"_YFORM_"M15');" write " if(objcontrol.type!='hidden' && !objcontrol.disabled) {objcontrol.focus();}" $$$EndScript() quit DefaultVariableInput(pYKEY="",pYFELD,pYLFN) new strValue set strValue = "" if pYLFN=15 { set strValue = $$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(pYFELD) } elseif pYLFN=-1 { ;Primary Key set strValue = YKEY } quit strValue GetNumberofCounts() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ***** TODO: Don't think this is used any more. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 15-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: variable prefix; use YM ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SR: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idStocktake,intCount,objData,objSTHeader set objData = $$GetFormData^COMUtilForm(YFORM,"M") set intCount = "" set idStocktake = $piece(objData,Y,1) if idStocktake'="" { set objSTHeader = $get(^INWEINVP(YM,idStocktake,1)) set intCount = $$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(objSTHeader) } quit intCount IsButtonDisabled(pidStocktake,pintButton) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Common method to determine for a number of buttons whether they are disabled. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 14-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Move CanCloseCount test to INStocktakeCount; ; get strStatus once. ; 10-Jan-2008 pjones BR014866 : pintButton=5 now calls CanPostHandler rather ; than CanPost directly ; 12-Nov-2007 pjones Returning the strStatus ; 07-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014763: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intMaxCounts,intMinCounts,objSetup,strStatus set strStatus = $$$OK set objSetup = $get(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)) if '$$$NoKey(pidStocktake) { ;@netManager will handle if no key set intMaxCounts = $$$INVORGStocktakeMaxCount(objSetup) set intMinCounts = $$$INVORGStocktakeMinCount(objSetup) if pintButton =1 { set strStatus = $$CanEditCount^INStocktaking(pidStocktake) } elseif pintButton=5 { set strStatus = $$CanPostHandler^INStocktaking(pidStocktake) } elseif pintButton=6 { set strStatus = $$CanCloseCounting^INStocktaking(pidStocktake,intMinCounts) } elseif pintButton=7 { set strStatus = $$CanCreateNewCount^INStocktaking(pidStocktake,intMaxCounts) } elseif pintButton=9 { set strStatus = $$CanCloseCount^INStocktakeCount(pidStocktake) ; } elseif pintButton=9 { set strStatus = $$CanCloseCount^INStocktaking(pidStocktake) ; SR15810 } } $$$YQHandler(strStatus) quit strStatus ; vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv SUPERSEDED CODE ;############################################################################### ; ; THE REPORTING FUNCTION IN THIS ROUTINE HAS BEEN SUPERSEDED BY THE ROUTINE ; INStocktakeReport1 WHICH IS BASED ON STOCK BUNDLES. ; ;############################################################################### Report() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; DRUCKEN INVENTUR AUFNAHMELISTE ; (GENERATION OF STOCKTAKE COUNT SHEETS) ; ; Inputs : ; ; ByRef : ; VORG(1) = INVENTUR ; VORG(2) = BETRIEB ; VORG(3) = WARENGRUPPE ; VORG(4) = RESERVEIERTE ODER ALLE ;Or ; VORG(5) = Print Supplier ; VORG(6) = Print Serial Number ; VORG(7) = Bins From ; VORG(8) = Bin To ; VORG(9) = Print Snapped Quantity ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Specific tag to meet coding standards; separate Heading ; 17-Aug-2006 GRF Doco; quits ; 07-AUG-2006 FAN SR14857: Stocktake Batch/Update changes ; 01-May-2006 JW&PP SR14508: Added Bin and Snapped Qty parameters ; 06.06.2000 DT Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new LFN,LFN1,BET,ART,ART1,WG,ME,LAP,AUF,POS,UES set YKOPF = $$$Text("IN00459") ;Stocktake Count Report //SR14508 merge VORG = ^CacheTempStocktakePara(YUSER) SET VORG(1) = $GET(VORG(1)) ;VORGABE INVENTUR ;default stocktaking ;IF +$GET(VORG(1))=0 DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)) QUIT ;KEIN Datum ;no Date ;BR014741 allow non numeric stocktakes. set VORG(2) = $TRANSLATE($get(VORG(2)),",",";") ; Locn Filter List ; FIXME : ";" *IS* the @netManager delimiter for set VORG(3) = $TRANSLATE($get(VORG(3)),",",";") ; Group Filter List ; multi-select so these lines should not be necessary SET VORG(4) = $GET(VORG(4)) SET VORG(5) = $GET(VORG(5)) ;LIEFERRANT DRUCKEN ;print SET VORG(6) = $GET(VORG(6)) ;chargen/SN-NUMMER DRUCKEN ;print SET VORG(7) = $GET(VORG(7)) ; From Storage SET VORG(8) = $GET(VORG(8)) ; To Storage SET VORG(9) = +$GET(VORG(9)) ; Print Snapped Quantity SET VORG(15) = $GET(VORG(15)) ; Count SET VORG(18) = $GET(VORG(18)) ; Count KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;LÖSCHEN ZWISCHENDATEI ;Delete set UES(1) = $$SetHeader(VORG(1),VORG(9)) ; SR15810 DO ^WWWBACK DO DRUCK ;WERTE DRUCKEN ;print DO STOP^WWWTAB ;ENDE TABELLE ;termination tabulation KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;LÖSCHEN ZWISCHENDATEI ;Delete QUIT SetHeader(pidStocktake,pblnShowSOH) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; BEARBEITEN ÜBERSCHRIFT ;Heading ; ; History : ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Separate Heading ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHeading ; TODO : Need to add Lot No, Expiry Date etc. as required to match bin as well as storage. ; See INStocktakeReport1 ; 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 (optional) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ ; | | | | | | | ; ####### | Counted:____ | User:____ | Checked By:____ | | | | ; | | | | | | | ; Id # | Storage | Item | Description | Unit of Measure | Count Quantity | Stock On Hand Quantity | ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ set $piece(strHeading,Y,1) = "
"_VORG(1)_"

"_$$$StrINWEINVStocktakingCountingNumber set $piece(strHeading,Y,2) = "
"_$$^WWWTEXT(32056)_":_____________

"_$$$StrINWEINVStockLocation set $piece(strHeading,Y,3) = "
"_$$^WWWTEXT(32057)_":_____________

"_$$^WWWTEXT(32024) set $piece(strHeading,Y,4) = "
"_$$^WWWTEXT(32058)_":_____________

"_$$^WWWTEXT(32026) set $piece(strHeading,Y,5) = "


"_$$^WWWTEXT(32030) set $piece(strHeading,Y,6) = "


"_$$$StrINWEINVActualQuantity if pblnShowSOH set $piece(strHeading,Y,7)="


"_$$^WWWTEXT("IN00449") quit strHeading SORT quit DRUCK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 07-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Snapped Qty being shown twice instead of Count ; Qty and Snapped Qty ; 28-Oct-2007 PJ/shobby SRBR01557: Check whether the item is valid in this count ; 27-Nov-2006 JW BR014285: Item group change. Lang text. ; 30-May-2006 JW SR14680: Show reserved/order nums ; 19-May-2006 JW SR14652: Mark as printed ; 01-May-2006 JW&PP SR14508: Added Bin and Snapped Qty parameters ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnShow SET SUM=0 ;SUMME ;sum //DO ^INLISTKOPF ;DRUCKEN DECKBLATT ;print DO Print^WWWLISTKOPF("11;12;13;14") //SR14508 DO UPUEB ;DRUCKEN ÜBERSCHRIFT ;print superscription SET YDDSATZ=0 ;AUSWERTUNG DRUCKEN ;print SET LFN="" FOR SET LFN=$ORDER(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN)) QUIT:LFN="" DO . if '$$Exists^INWEINVCount(VORG(1),LFN,$get(VORG(15))) quit . SET LFN1=$GET(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN,1)) ;BESTANDSDATEN . QUIT:LFN1="" . IF VORG(4)=1 IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,32)'="" QUIT ;NUR FREIE WARE ;only wares . IF VORG(4)=2 IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,32)="" QUIT ;NUR AUFTRÄGE ;only . ; . SET BET=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,2) ;BETRIEB . IF VORG(2)'="" QUIT:'$FIND(";"_VORG(2)_";",";"_BET_";") ;NICHT FÜR DIESEN BETRIEB . SET ART=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,1) ;ARTIKEL ;item . QUIT:ART="" . SET ART1=$GET(^INART(YM,ART,1)) . ; . SET WG=$PIECE(ART1,Y,30) ;WARENGRUPPE . IF $GET(VORG(3))'="" QUIT:WG=""||'$FIND(";"_VORG(3)_";",";"_WG_";") ;FALSCHE WARENGRUPPE . ; . SET ME="" ;MENGENEINHEIT . IF $PIECE(ART1,Y,40)'="" SET ME=$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE(ART1,Y,40),1)),Y,1) . SET LAP=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,3) . ; . quit:(VORG(7)'="")&&(VORG(7) ] LAP) // SR14508: Stock location limiter . quit:(VORG(8)'="")&&(LAP ] VORG(8)) . ; . if $$$INWEINVCountPrinted(LFN1)="" do //SR14652 - Straight set as may save may interfere with editting... . . set $$$INWEINVCountPrinted(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN,1))=$horolog . ; . SET WED=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,6) . SET AUF=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,32) . SET POS=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,33) . ; . WRITE ! ; TODO : ! and YCR? . WRITE YCR . DO NL^WWWTAB . DO NFR^WWWTAB . WRITE LFN ;ZÄHLNUMMER . WRITE " " . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE BET," / ",LAP ;BETRIEB UND LAGERPLATZ ;location And stock location . IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,9)="HISTORY" WRITE " "_$$^WWWTEXT(32859) ; History //BR014285 . IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,6)'="" WRITE "
("_$$^WWWDATE($PIECE(LFN1,Y,6))_")" . WRITE " " . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE ART_"
" . //IF WG'="" WRITE "("_WG_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"WARENGRUPPE",SPRACHE,WG,1)),Y,1) . IF WG'="" WRITE "("_WG_") "_$$GetDescription^INDItemGroup(WG) //BR014285 . WRITE " " . DO ZW^WWWTAB . ; . set blnShow = $$$NO . ; . if $$$INWEINVStockType(LFN1)="S" do //SR14680 . . WRITE "" . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32047)_": "_AUF ; Order . . IF POS'="" WRITE "-"_POS . . WRITE "
" . . set blnShow = $$$YES . ; . if $$$INWEINVStockType(LFN1)="R" do . . WRITE "" . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32480)_": "_AUF ; Reserved . . WRITE "
" . . set blnShow = $$$YES . ; . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(ART1,Y,1) . WRITE $EXTRACT(YINHALT,1,40) . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(ART1,Y,14) . IF $TRANSLATE(YINHALT,"| ")=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(ART1,Y,1),"| ") SET YINHALT="" . IF YINHALT'="" WRITE "
" . ; . ;LONGER TEXT . FOR YIZ(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1),999)="" DO . . SET YIZ(2)=$TRANSLATE($$^WWWUML($PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1)),1),"|"," ") . . QUIT:$TRANSLATE(YIZ(2)," ")="" . . WRITE $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),1,40) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),41,80)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),41,80) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),81,120)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),81,120) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),121,160)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),121,160) . . IF $PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1)+1,999)'="" WRITE "
",YCR . ; . WRITE " " . IF VORG(5)=1 IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,7)'="" DO ;LIEFERANT INFO ;supplier . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR,"("_$PIECE(LFN1,Y,7)_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INLIEF(YM,$PIECE(LFN1,Y,7),1)),Y,8) . ; . IF VORG(6)=1 IF ($PIECE(LFN1,Y,31)'="") || ($PIECE(LFN1,Y,5)'="") DO ;MIT CHARGEN/SERIENNUMMERN DRUCKEN ;by means of print . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR,$PIECE(LFN1,Y,31) ;CHARGE . . IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,31)'="" IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,5)'="" WRITE " / " ;CHARGE . . WRITE YCR,$PIECE(LFN1,Y,5) ;SN . ; . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . WRITE ME ;MENGENEINHEIT . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . ;IF blnShow WRITE +$PIECE(LFN1,Y,44)_"
" ; SR15810 : This is Snapped Qty (Target) not Count Qty . IF blnShow WRITE +$PIECE(LFN1,Y,4)_"
" . ; . //IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,32)'="" WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(LFN1,Y,4),0,2)_"
" . FOR YI=1:1:30 WRITE " " . ; . if VORG(9) do //SR14508 . . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . . write +$piece(LFN1,Y,44) ; Snapped Quantity . . write " " . ; . ;ENDE ;termination . DO EF^WWWTAB . DO EL^WWWTAB QUIT GESAMT ;GESAMT ;total ;total whole QUIT UPUEB ;ÜBERSCHRIFT ;superscription WRITE "
" DO START00^WWWTAB DO NL^WWWTAB DO NF^WWWTAB WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE YKOPF do Title^INWEINVD(VORG(1)) //SR14508 WRITE "" DO EF^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB DO STOP^WWWTAB DO START100^WWWTAB WRITE "
" WRITE "" DO NL^WWWTAB FOR I=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(UES(1),Y,I,99)="" DO NHW^WWWTAB WRITE $PIECE(UES(1),Y,I)," " DO EH^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB WRITE "" QUIT Title(pidStocktake) new strName,dteDATE ;WRITE "
",$$^WWWDATE(pidStocktake) ;INVENTURDATUM WRITE "
",pidStocktake ;INVENTUR; 07-AUG-2006 FAN SR14857: Stocktake Batch/Update changes set strName = $piece($get(^INWEINVP(YM,pidStocktake,1)),Y,4) IF strName'="" WRITE " - "_strName ;BEMERKUNG ;remark set dteDATE = $piece($get(^INWEINVP(YM,pidStocktake,1)),Y,2) ;SR14857: Stocktake Batch/Update changes IF dteDATE'="" WRITE " - "_$$^WWWDATE(dteDATE) ;DATE SR14857: Stocktake Batch/Update changes quit ; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ SUPERSEDED CODE
